section.title: Hardware requirements for the server
section.p:
For the server, the following general hardware requirements apply:
Two 1GbE network interfaces
16 GB of memory
Intel or AMD x86-64 processor with at least four cores
Disk 1 size : 25 GB
Disk 2 (store) size : 64 GB

section.title: Hardware requirements for the
section.p:
For the , the following general hardware requirements apply:
One network interface
4 GB of memory
Intel or AMD x86-64 processor
16 GB disk space

section.title: Software requirements for
section.p:
requires one of the following operating systems:
RHEL Linux™ 7 in x86_64
CentOS 7 on x86_64
In order to install , you must provision the operating system in any of the following supported environments:

ul.li: Cloud providers: SoftLayer, Microsoft Azure, or Amazon AWS.
Bare metal system in a supported cloud provider or in your own location.
VMware ESXi v5.5 or higher in a supported cloud provider or in your own location.

section.p: For a virtual image, ensure that you select the Reserve all guest memory (All locked) check box to avoid memory ballooning by VMware ESXi. Memory ballooning is a memory management technique used by VMware ESXi and can lead to unused memory in being reserved for VMware ESXi. For more information about memory ballooning, see the Understanding Memory Resource Management in VMware ESX document.

section.title: Supported deployment methods
section.p:
The following methods of deployment are supported:
CentOS container running in Docker 1.8 on a CentOS 7 Host System
Redhat container running in Docker 1.8 on a Redhat 7 Host System
Direct RPM install on any supported Host System
